Package it.polimi.ingsw.msgUtilities.server

Class ToDoMsgWriter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.msgUtilities.server.ToDoMsgWriter
public class ToDoMsgWriter
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains all the methods useful to write an XML schema message which represents an indication of what to do to a client from the server.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ToDoMsgWriter()
    This constructor initializes the document with the standard XML schema content in toDoMsg file (content in resources folder).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    org.w3c.dom.Document toDoAction​(java.lang.String action)
    This method writes an Action to do indication message
    org.w3c.dom.Document toDoChoseGod​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ids)
    This method writes a message to inform the client who has to chose his god.
    org.w3c.dom.Document toDoTurn​(java.lang.String possibleOperation)
    This method writes a Turn indication message.
    org.w3c.dom.Document toDoWaitMsg​(java.lang.String inActionPlayer, java.lang.String waitFor)
    This method writes a wait to do indication message with the reason for waiting and who is acting.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ToDoMsgWriter

      public ToDoMsgWriter()
      This constructor initializes the document with the standard XML schema content in toDoMsg file (content in resources folder).

  • Method Details

    • toDoAction

      public org.w3c.dom.Document toDoAction​(java.lang.String action)
      This method writes an Action to do indication message
      Parameters:
      action - is the action that the client has to do
      Returns:
      the updated document

    • toDoWaitMsg

      public org.w3c.dom.Document toDoWaitMsg​(java.lang.String inActionPlayer, java.lang.String waitFor)
      This method writes a wait to do indication message with the reason for waiting and who is acting.
      Parameters:
      inActionPlayer - is the player who is acting
      waitFor - is the reason for waiting
      Returns:
      the updated document

    • toDoTurn

      public org.w3c.dom.Document toDoTurn​(java.lang.String possibleOperation)
      This method writes a Turn indication message. It informs the client that he must perform the turn he can start playing and what operation he can perform
      Parameters:
      possibleOperation - is the operation he can perform
      Returns:
      the updated document

    • toDoChoseGod

      public org.w3c.dom.Document toDoChoseGod​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ids)
      This method writes a message to inform the client who has to chose his god.
      Parameters:
      ids - is the list of gods left to choose from
      Returns:
      the updated document
